!define HTML { {{{
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>Simple Shadow DOM example</title>
    
  </head>
  <body>
      <div id="1">
      </div>
      <div id="shadowhost"> 
      </div>
  <script> 	
    let div = document.getElementById("1");
    div.innerHTML = "<button> test </test>"; 	
    let shadowhost  = document.getElementById('shadowhost');
    let shadowroot = shadowhost.attachShadow({mode: 'open'});
    let divShadow = document.createElement("div");
    divShadow.innerHTML = "<button id=\"button\"> klick mich </button>";
    shadowroot.appendChild(divShadow);
    </script>    
  </body>
</html>

}}} }
